dict.string:
command=`echo ' applescript = %{tell application \\"Finder\\" to choose color} if ENV["TM_CURRENT_WORD"] =~ /#?([0-9A-Fa-f]{6})/ then applescript += " default color {" applescript += $1.scan(/../).map {|i| eval("0x" +i)*256}.join(",") applescript += "}" end puts applescript '| /usr/bin/ruby`
osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate' echo " color = `echo $command | osascript 2> /dev/null` color = color.map {|i| i/256} printf '#%02X%02X%02X', *color " | /usr/bin/ruby 2>/dev/null
osascript >/dev/null 2>&1 -e 'tell application "TextMate" to activate' &
